sentences.en: "Performance" is undoubtedly one of the most surreal movies ever made.
sentences.cn: 《迷幻演出》无疑是有史以来最离奇的电影之一。

sentences.en: Burke's sentiments undoubtedly struck a responsive chord in Parliament.
sentences.cn: 伯克的观点无疑引起了议会的积极回应。

sentences.en: Country music was undoubtedly one of the forerunners of rock and roll.
sentences.cn: 乡村音乐无疑是摇滚乐的先导之一。

sentences.en: Hanley is undoubtedly a great player.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，汉利是名很棒的球员。

sentences.en: It is undoubtedly she who has said that.
Kite is undoubtedly a class player.
sentences.cn: 凯特绝对是个一流选手。

sentences.en: Mr Brooke is undoubtedly in a spot of bother.
sentences.cn: 布鲁克先生肯定遇到了点小麻烦。

sentences.en: She undoubtedly met Captain Waite at sea.
sentences.cn: 她在海上一定遇见了韦特船长。

sentences.en: The most testing time is undoubtedly in the early months of your return to work.
sentences.cn: 最考验人的时期莫过于重新回来上班的头几个月。

sentences.en: The poverty figures were undoubtedly an embarrassment to the president.
sentences.cn: 贫困数字毫无疑问让总统非常难堪。

sentences.en: The story was certainly a favourite one, but it was undoubtedly pure invention.
sentences.cn: 这个故事当然特别受欢迎，但它无疑纯属虚构。

sentences.en: There is undoubtedly a great deal of truth in what he says.
sentences.cn: 他所说的的确大部分都是实情。

sentences.en: These sort of statistics are undoubtedly alarming.
sentences.cn: 这样的统计数据的确堪忧。

sentences.en: They had undoubtedly made progress in the six years that separated the two periods.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，他们在这两个时期相隔的6年间取得了进展。

sentences.en: Undoubtedly, political and economic factors have played their part.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，政治和经济因素在其中起了作用。

sentences.en: While such ways of traveling certainly have their benefits, there are also undoubtedly some disadvantages.
sentences.cn: 这种旅行方式当然有它们的长处所在，但毫无疑问也有一些缺憾。

trans.tran_cn: 毋庸置疑地，的确地，显然，必定，无疑
trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that sth exists or is definitely true
